body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Current behavior:**
```
$> kubectl -n rook-ceph get deployments -o jsonpath='{range .items[*]}{.metadata.name}{"  \treq/upd/avl: "}{.spec.replicas}{"/"}{.status.updatedReplicas}{"/"}{.status.readyReplicas}{"  \trook-version="}{.metadata.labels.rook-version}{"  \tceph-version="}{.metadata.labels.ceph-version}{"\n"}{end}'
csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner  	req/upd/avl: 2/2/2  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
csi-rbdplugin-provisioner  	req/upd/avl: 2/2/2  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-mgr-a  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-a  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-b  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-c  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-operator  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-osd-0  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-1  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-2  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-3  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-4  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-5  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-tools  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=

$> kubectl -n rook-ceph get daemonsets -o jsonpath='{range .items[*]}{.metadata.name}{"  \treq/upd/avl: "}{.spec.replicas}{"/"}{.status.updatedReplicas}{"/"}{.status.readyReplicas}{"  \trook-version="}{.metadata.labels.rook-version}{"  \tceph-version="}{.metadata.labels.ceph-version}{"\n"}{end}'
csi-cephfsplugin  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
csi-rbdplugin  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-agent  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
rook-discover  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
```

**Expected behavior:**
The CSI daemonsets and deployments should probably have the `rook-version` label added to them just as the Ceph daemons.

```
$> kubectl -n rook-ceph get deployments -o jsonpath='{range .items[*]}{.metadata.name}{"  \treq/upd/avl: "}{.spec.replicas}{"/"}{.status.updatedReplicas}{"/"}{.status.readyReplicas}{"  \trook-version="}{.metadata.labels.rook-version}{"  \tceph-version="}{.metadata.labels.ceph-version}{"\n"}{end}'
csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner  	req/upd/avl: 2/2/2  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=
csi-rbdplugin-provisioner  	req/upd/avl: 2/2/2  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-mgr-a  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-a  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-b  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-mon-c  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-operator  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-osd-0  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-1  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-2  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-3  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-4  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-osd-5  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=14.2.4
rook-ceph-tools  	req/upd/avl: 1/1/1  	rook-version=  	ceph-version=

$> kubectl -n rook-ceph get daemonsets -o jsonpath='{range .items[*]}{.metadata.name}{"  \treq/upd/avl: "}{.spec.replicas}{"/"}{.status.updatedReplicas}{"/"}{.status.readyReplicas}{"  \trook-version="}{.metadata.labels.rook-version}{"  \tceph-version="}{.metadata.labels.ceph-version}{"\n"}{end}'
csi-cephfsplugin  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version= v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec 	ceph-version=
csi-rbdplugin  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=
rook-ceph-agent  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=
rook-discover  	req/upd/avl: //  	rook-version=v1.1.0-beta.0.262.gfdd92ec  	ceph-version=
```

@travisn @Madhu-1 does this make sense to you?

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
- Install Rook with CSI enabled

labels.description: Issues that are great for new contributors to familiarize themselves with Rook.
labels.name: beginner

title: Ceph: CSI deployments/daemonsets should have "rook-version" label
